//Weight.h
#ifndef WEIGHT_H
#define WEIGHT_H
#include <iostream>
class Weight
{
	public:
		Weight();
		virtual ~Weight();
	protected:
	private:
};




#endif // WEIGHT_H




--------------------------------------------------------------





//Weight.cpp


#include "Weight.h"
#include <iostream>


using namespace std;


Weight::Weight()
{
	//const
}// end Weight


Weight::~Weight()
{
	//deconst
}// end ~Weight
